Alikay Naturals Majestic Beauty Stretch Mark & Scar Remover (2019 formulation)

Brand: Alikay Naturals

Category: Skin Fading/Lightener

Ingredients: : BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), DROMAIUS NOVAE-HOLLANDIAE (EMU) OIL, ROSA AFFINIS RUBIGINOSA (ROSEHIP) OIL, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E) TRITICUM VULGARE (WHEAT) GERM OIL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA
book: 3099-Alikay Naturals Majestic Beauty Stretch Mark & Scar Remover (2019 formulation)

chunk:
IA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT.

Directions: Massage into affected areas or areas you wish to prevent skin imperfections. Do not rinse off. Use daily.

Warnings: Disclaimer: The ingredients used in this product are labeled as safe for use by pregnant and nur
book: 3099-Alikay Naturals Majestic Beauty Stretch Mark & Scar Remover (2019 formulation)

chunk:
by pregnant and nursing women. If you have any skin irritations after use of this product, discontinue use and consult a physician.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
